body_html: @saudet I was able to build with Xcode 9.4.1 installed. If you are seeing something like Symbol not found: _ncclAllReduce, try to copy nccl.h from Bazel's temp directories to tensorflow/contrib/nccl/kernels; see this comment.
body_text: @saudet I was able to build with Xcode 9.4.1 installed. If you are seeing something like Symbol not found: _ncclAllReduce, try to copy nccl.h from Bazel's temp directories to tensorflow/contrib/nccl/kernels; see this comment.
body: @saudet I was able to build with Xcode 9.4.1 installed. If you are seeing something like Symbol not found: _ncclAllReduce, try to copy `nccl.h` from Bazel's temp directories to `tensorflow/contrib/nccl/kernels`; see [this comment](https://gist.github.com/74th/31eacbbac6351649caa417b19231f09e#gistcomment-2626681).
